message.p: Hangman keeps track of the best players, and since that could be you, you might want to login under you own name. If you never logged in before, choose any name and password. If you would rather not register for some reason, use the guest/guest account.
Warning: hangman contains some words and pictures that may offend really young players.

messages.message: You entered the wrong password, or the username is already in use. If you are a returning user, please try again. If you are a new user, please try registring with a different name.

message.p:
For each game won, you gain 20 points, minus one point for each wrong letter guess.
For each game lost, you loose 10 points, so you better try hard to guess the word!
